dcterms:description: A high frequency and low noise dataset published by Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) containing sequences in which people simulate typical pedestrian activities. It includes 3D coordinates of 41 joints located along their bodies gathered at 120 Hz.
dcterms:title: CMU Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the CMU dataset, filtered for specific pedestrian activities including walking, stopping, starting, and standing. It consists of 490 sequences composed of 302,470 pedestrian poses from 31 different subjects.
dcterms:title: CMU-UAH Dataset
